title: A Heart Of Stone
description: Amanda was raised in an abusive household by a mother believed to be opressed and influenced by a demonic spirit. When her mother took her own life, It is believed that Amanda inherited the demon. She became a witch, ghost hunter, developed psychic ability and used several forms of divination. Surviving abusive relationships and rape, the darkness was being pulled to her like a magnet as the demon tore apart her life, torturing her and her family for over 12 years.In September 2012, she stepped forward and gave her heart to God finally causing the demon to detach from the family. She felt as if she were on fire, burning from the inside out, but it didn't hurt. She could feel something inside her breaking as God healed her heart.
author: Amanda Springer
